DataElement.preferredName: Bone Scan Diagnostic Imaging Post Therapeutic Procedure Assessment Ind-3
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator that asks whether a bone scan assessment occurred following protocol therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Bone Scan Diagnostic Imaging Post Therapeutic Procedure Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the diagnostic imaging (any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation) assessment (the determination of the value, significance, or extent of) or evalution through use of a bone scan (a nuclear imaging method used to evaluate pathological bone metabolism) after a therapeutic procedure (an action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A nuclear imaging method used to evaluate pathological bone metabolism. :Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: A nuclear imaging method used to evaluate pathological bone metabolism.
Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the patient have a bone s
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have a bone scan after completion or discontinuation of protocol therapy

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessment Ind-3 (2018441v1) with VD Yes No Unknown Indicator (3506034v1) - dbw
